sentences.english: Here I am lifting the crucible out with my new tongs that I hurriedly threw together.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我取消我的坩堝內，我趕緊扔起來的新堂。

sentences.english: The slag resistance of magnesia - zircon castable was investigated by crucible test.
sentences.chinese: 採用坩堝法研究了鎂鋯質澆注料的抗渣性。

sentences.english: This is the last stop on our crucible making tour.
sentences.chinese: 這是對我們的決策之行的最後一站坩堝。

sentences.english: The clamps shape need as that of crucible, Avoiding the concertrate stress destruction the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 坩堝夾鉗應與坩堝形狀相符，避免局部受力損壞。

sentences.english: The clamps shape need as that of crucible, Avoiding the concertrate stress destruction the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 坩堝夾鉗應與坩堝形狀相符，避免局部受力損壞。

sentences.english: Take the adequate distance between the furnace wall and the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 坩堝與爐壁之間應保持適當間隔，且用楔牢牢固定。

sentences.english: Many cauldrons seem to be at least partially magical.
sentences.chinese: 大多數坩堝似乎至少有部分的魔法。

sentences.english: Cauldrons are a basic item for any witch or wizard.
sentences.chinese: 不論對女巫或是男巫來說，坩堝都是一種基本的用品。

sentences.english: The Dispense Pot waits the demand signal from the P. O. U.
sentences.chinese: 配給坩堝等待從應用點發出的請求。

sentences.english: What this text design is a automatic control in temperature in melting in resistance system.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計的是坩堝熔化電阻爐溫度自動控制系統。

sentences.english: Levitation melting is used instead of graphite crucible heating.
sentences.chinese: 用懸浮熔融代替石墨坩堝加熱方法。

sentences.english: Here is the new and improved crucible .
sentences.chinese: 這是新的和改進的坩堝。

sentences.english: Then put the crucible on the balance and weigh it.
sentences.chinese: 然後把坩堝放在天平上稱一下。

sentences.english: Some places like New York City are natural melting pots.
sentences.chinese: 一些地方例如紐約是一個天然的坩堝。

sentences.english: Hospital wards have become crucibles where the forces tearing Venezuela apart have converged.
sentences.chinese: 醫院病房成了這個國家各種破壞性力量交匯的坩堝。

sentences.english: Tianfu card crucible brand has become the most graphite crucible.
sentences.chinese: 天府牌》坩堝成爲國內最有品牌的石墨坩堝。
